0: I will look for hotels with free wifi in the future
And that is all in addition to their complete screw ups on payment and check out
Location is the main thing with this hotel
The room was clean but the bed has seen better days
On walking distance you will find the water side with the beaches the pier and the mag mile
The location was close to where we wanted to visit
Consistent with most DoubleTree hotels it felt luxurious without being over the top
there is also a Stans Donuts a block away2 blocks to the lake and 2 blocks to the Mag Mile and 2 blocks to Navy Pier so the location can not be beat
It was convienent to my doctors office and hospital
The location is good for the price
1: I travel 90 of the time for business and I can honestly say that this has Never Been the experience I have ever had with any hotel of any star rating
Close to wear I wanted to be
time to do breakfast pack your bags
Room was nice but bathroom not as clean and I prefer
We just needed an affordable place to sleep
Staff was nice but no free WiFi
Worst experience we have ever had in a hotel and for how much this hotel costs these four days were appalling
Out of 5 interactions with the front desk staff only 2 were positive
Could n’t find polStaf were very friendly and helpful
2: During check in the bell guy told us to park in the garage and when checking out to hand in the ticket for the release ticket
no free bottled water in room
The one thing I did not like was the very slow elevators
STILL have not RECIEVED MY DEPOSIT FROM OUR STAY
It was over an hour after the 3 pm check in time
I tried to call the front desk and kept getting the operator who said they were nt answering
VERY VERY bright bathroom actually could use one smaller light to help get in and out without eye shock
We contacted Priceline to switch to a different hotel with a pool but the DoubleTree would not issue a refund
I typically like to eat at the hotel as after a long day I do not like to go running around and I found the lobby bar and seating to be really appealing
Our room was n’t serviced until we called and still they did n’t really did n’t do the job
